enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2006/L.17/Rev.1), the SBI decides to continue consideration of this matter at SBI 25. closING session On Thursday evening, 25 May , the closing SBI 24 plenary convened.
A number of delegates commented on the Adaptation Fund.
Parties then adopted the report of the session (FCCC/SBI/2006/L.1).
SBI Chair Thomas Becker thanked participants for their work and closed SBI 24 at 7:24 pm.
